name: SearchOptions
description: Specifies the options to be included in a search operation.

properties.name: ignorePunct
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to ignore all punctuation characters between words. Corresponds to the Ignore punctuation check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

properties.name: ignoreSpace
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to ignore all whitespace between words. Corresponds to the Ignore whitespace characters check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

properties.name: matchCase
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to perform a case sensitive search. Corresponds to the Match case check box in the Find and Replace dialog box (Edit menu).

properties.name: matchPrefix
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to match words that begin with the search string. Corresponds to the Match prefix check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

properties.name: matchSuffix
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to match words that end with the search string. Corresponds to the Match suffix check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

properties.name: matchWildcards
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the search will be performed using special search operators. Corresponds to the Use wildcards check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

properties.name: matchWholeWord
properties.description: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to find operation only entire words, not text that is part of a larger word. Corresponds to the Find whole words only check box in the Find and Replace dialog box.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
